title: Windows 8.1 Pro VL X64 Update 3 Multi-12 April 2015 by Generatio
description:
[b]Windows 8.1 Pro VL X64 Update 3 Multi-12 April 2015


[ RELEASE INFO ]


* This release contains one ISO [SOURCE ISO] and eleven exe-files.

* All exe-files are created from original MSDN ISO's for each language.

* This is done with SmartVersion, a program that calculates the
* difference between two files (one of which is used as the source)
* and then creates an svf-file based on that difference.

* Hashes attached in a separate .txt

[ DOWNLOAD INFO ]

* Download the Source ISO and preferred language.exe

* If you want en-US then just download the SOURCE ISO

* Run the exe-file in the same folder as the SOURCE ISO.
* This will extract & recreate the original ISO, fully updated and
* in the selected language.

* NOTE!

* The extracted ISO(s) is NOT the English SOURCE ISO + an integrated
* language pack, it is an original ISO for each language.

[ EDITIONS INCLUDED ]

* Windows 8.1 Pro VL

[ LANGUAGES & SOURCES ]

* da-DK [ Danish ]- - - - dvd-6050878
* de-DE [ German ]- - - -dvd-6050885
* en-US [ English ] - - - -dvd-6050880
* es-ES [ Spanish ] - - - dvd-6050903
* fi-FI [ Finnish ] - - - - - dvd-6050883
* fr-FR [ French ]- - - - - dvd-6050884
* it-IT [ Italian ] - - - - - -dvd-6050889
* nb-NO [ Norwegian ] - -dvd-6050894
* nl-NL [ Dutch ] - - - - - dvd-6050879
* pt-BR [ Brazilian ] - - - dvd-6050896
* pt-PT [ Portuguese ]- - dvd-6050897
* sv-SE [ Swedish ] - - - dvd-6050904

[ SOURCE ISO ]

* W81.Pro.X64.en-US.iso - Size: 5,06GB

[ EXE-FILES ]

* W81.Pro.X64.da-DK.exe - Size: 325MB
* W81.Pro.X64.de-DE.exe - Size: 414MB
* W81.Pro.X64.es-ES.exe - Size: 404MB
* W81.Pro.X64.fi-FI.exe - - -Size: 334MB
* W81.Pro.X64.fr-FR.exe - - Size: 396MB
* W81.Pro.X64.it-IT.exe - - -Size: 347MB
* W81.Pro.X64.nb-NO.exe - Size: 335MB
* W81.Pro.X64.nl-NL.exe - - Size: 337MB
* W81.Pro.X64.pt-BR.exe - -Size: 363MB
* W81.Pro.X64.pt-PT.exe - - Size: 350MB
* W81.Pro.X64.sv-SE.exe - -Size: 329MB

[ CONTENTS ]

* Integrated / Pre-installed in Audit Mode:

* .NET Framework 2.0, 3.0 & 3.5
* .NET Framework 4.5.2 (KB2901907) + languagepack
* Important & Security Updates - 2015-04-14

* Setupcomplete / Post-install:

* KB890930
* Defender Updates

[ FEATURES ]

* Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 8.1 (Microsoft DaRT)

[ COMMENTS & ACTIVATION INFO ]

* A WPI-window will pop up in the last phase of the installation.
* To Pre-Activate Windows, select "KMSPico" and "Begin Install".
* To skip activation, just click on "Exit".

* Activator:

* KMSpico v10.0.4 Portable Edition
[ Potential False Positive Virus Alarm ]

[ INSTALLATION ]

* Create bootable USB (highly recommended) with Rufus (attached)
* or, if you really must; burn to DVD-DL at slow speed.


* Hope you will enjoy this release!

* Regards,
* Generation2 [/b]
